title: Stacey Solomon miffed as Joe Swash helps with housework at 12.18pm
text:
Stacey Solomon called out Joe Swash for not helping with the housework until after midday (Picture: Instagram)

Stacey Solomon was not happy with her boyfriend Joe Swash for having a lie-in when she was busy tidying up.

Stacey, who recently gave birth to their son Rex, gave fans a glimpse at her hectic day sorting out the kids and their house.

She was a busy bee as she changed the bins, kept her sons entertained and fed the baby without even stopping for a cuppa.

Eventually Joe joined her downstairs, and the Loose Women star complained that he hadn’t got out of bed until 12.18pm on the afternoon and was only just getting stuck in.

On her Instagram Stories she shared a picture of Joe helping out with the hoovering.

She added the caption: ‘He’s finally arisen and I’m leaving him to finish up (the best chores imo hoovering and mopping) while I take the boys out for a walk so they don’t go STIR CRAZY’.

Earlier in the day she shared how she was helping her sons get ready for school on Monday.

Joe was up and at ’em…eventually (Picture: Instagram)

Stacey’s not a fan of ironing (Picture: Instagram)

Stacey takes out the trash (Picture: Instagram)

The presenter was also having to deal with her new baby boy being ‘unsettled’ as she had been away from him the night before.

Sharing a clip of her washing and sterilising his bottles, Stacey wrote: ‘Wash up last night’s bottles. It was a crazy night I feel like maybe because I stayed out the night before he was more unsettled because he woke up every 2 hours’.

Stacey and Joe had recently been celebrating her 30th birthday with a romantic trip to Brussels, which might not have been as either of them had hoped.

In the end the couple ended up returning to the UK early to be with their kids.

She posted on Instagram from the Eurostar: ‘Brussels was… Interesting… But we had an emotional morning this morning because both of us just want to go home to our babies. We got an earlier train.’
